body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        Visitors can easily spot Common Ravens in Canyonlands National Park. NPS Photo by Andrew Kuhn   Â    News Stay up to date with the latest park news releases, and join the park's online communities.   Photos & Multimedia Browse through photos and videos about Canyonlands.   History & Culture Discover the stories of generations that have called Canyonlands home, and the special places they left behind.   Nature Learn about the park's plant and animal life, geology, ecosystems, and other natural features.   Science & Research National parks are outdoor laboratories. Learn about research going on at Canyonlands.   Education  The place for teachers to plan a field trip and find lesson plans.   Kids & Youth  Find activities for kids and youth to do at home and during your visit to Canyonlands.   Management  Learn about park staff, statistics, and laws and policies.
title: Canyonlands National Park: Learn About the Park
